title: Looking for a Green Cobb Sovereign or Old Mill to complete my 519 of 520 off back set
author: Scott L.

posts.post_title: Looking for a Green Cobb Sovereign or Old Mill to complete my 519 of 520 off back set
posts.post_content:
It's been a fun journey. I've managed to knock out the other 12 cards with much of the help coming from board members.

Looking for a PSA/SGC Green Cobb Sovereign or Old Mill in the 1-2.5 range. The OM would likely need to be a 1/1.5.

I can replace your card so you can maintain your team or full set. Also can buy outright. 

Thanks for looking!

[STRIKE]Becker (American beauty, Tolstoi, cycle)[/STRIKE]
Cobb green portrait (sovereign, old mill)
[STRIKE]Crandall No Cap (EPDG, old mill, Sovereign)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Elberfeld Washington (old mill)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Engle (American beauty, cycle, Tolstoi)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Hoffman Danny (American beauty, cycle)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Hunter (American Beauty, Cycle Broad Leaf)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Killian portrait (American beauty, cycle, sovereign, Tolstoi)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Myers batting[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]O’Brien[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Pelty horizontal[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Schreck[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Willett (American Beauty, Cycle, Tolstoi)[/STRIKE]
good luck in your quest. I too have an alert set up for the Cross Tolstoi, lol
We’ll both have to luck into that one I think. Here’s hoping we both do!
Sweet Cap. 350/25 in the meantime 👍

[quote name="RCFire82" post=2304237]Sweet Cap. 350/25 in the meantime 👍[/QUOTE]

That’s right!

Scott,
Good Luck on the remaining! Awesome Job

Colton

[quote name="nineunder71" post=2304549]Scott,
Good Luck on the remaining! Awesome Job

Colton[/QUOTE]

Thanks Colton!

I checked my cards against your list and found one you need:

[IMG]https://iili.io/Hc4JQ2f.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://iili.io/Hc4JsrG.jpg[/IMG]

Please send me a PM if interested. Thanks,

Mike

Hi  Mike

Sending you a PM. 

Thanks. 

Scott

Knocked 2 off the list. Still need these 10. Would be grateful for any help. Have cash and or plenty to trade. 

Thanks. 

Scott

Nothing for me in REA bump. Please let me know if you have any of these you'd be willing to part with. 

Thanks!!!

Scott

Scratched another off the list! Please let me know if you have any of the last 9 you’d be willing to discuss. Plenty to trade and can also replace your card. Have $ as well. 

For example here’s my Elberfeld Washington. Happy to trade towards an Old Mill. Lower grade than a 3 is fine. 

Thanks. 

Scott

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52630421018_1bce3c007f_c_d.jpg[/IMG]

Knocked a few more off the list bump. Down to 7. I’d be ETERNALLY GRATEFUL for any help in securing these last few remaining! 

Thanks. 

Scott

Knocked FOUR of 7 off of my list!!!

3 thanks to board members…….THANK YOU!!

THREE left!!!

I know the Green Cobb will most likely need to come via auction house but hopeful someone has a Hunter or Willett they could part with. Can buy or trade for and replace your copy. 

Please let me know.

Thanks!

Scott
This is awesome. Can you post some scans of the cards? Are they raw or slabbed, or mixed? You have a Flickr account?

Thanks Michael!! 

All numerically graded (no authentic’s) by either PSA or SGC. 

I have a Flickr account but don’t have anywhere near all the cards uploaded. My plan was to finish it up and then scan all 520 in and share. It should be pretty neat when completed!

Scott
I wasn’t planning on selling this…but maybe to help finish your journey.
